entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Baie-Saint-Paul
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap Tourmente 3:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
